title: Dtravel
description: This project is not intended for production. The reason I built it was to practice building web applications from scratch and get familiarized with the use of MERN stack, Redux and Firebase.
extra: A platform that helps you find a special vacation in line with your taste. Check the filters to sort our destinations according to your wish, whether it is a tropical, snowy, hiking, cycling trip, or just a city tour.
